pinyin: dui4 yi3 xian1 an1 ji1 fen1

definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

sentences.english: Dehydration and fever can be treated with oral rehydration salts and paracetamol.
sentences.chinese: 脱水和发烧可用口服补液盐和对乙酰氨基酚进行治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare paracetamol sustained-release pellets and study its release characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备对乙酰氨基酚缓释微丸，并进行释放度考察。

sentences.english: And when combined with something like acetaminophen, it can result in liver damage.
sentences.chinese: 当与对乙酰氨基酚结合时，会导致肝脏损害。

sentences.english: But acetaminophen is a fairly weak analgesic, experts say.
sentences.chinese: 但专家认为，对乙酰氨基酚的镇痛效果不强。

definition: Ibuprofen or Nurofen/also called 異丁苯丙酸|异丁苯丙酸
diclofenac sodium, a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to reduce swelling and as painkiller/also called voltaren 扶他林
antipyretic (drug to reduce fever, such as sulfanilamide)
